price: 139. Kuwani (gaalada) waxay ku sugan yihiin waa baabbi’i,waana baadil waxay fali.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ مُتَبَّرٞ مَّا هُمۡ فِيهِ وَبَٰطِلٞ مَّا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna hāulāi mutabbarun mā hum fīhi wabāṭilun mā kānū yaʿmalūna
